Package ee.sk.digidoc

Class Summary
Base64Util Base64 utility methods.
CertID Models the ETSI element Holds info about a certificate but not the certificate itself.
CertValue Models the ETSI and elements.
CompleteCertificateRefs Models the ETSI CompleteCertificateRefs element
CompleteRevocationRefs Models the ETSI CompleteRevocationRefs element This contains some data from the OCSP response and it's digest
DataFile Represents a DataFile instance, that either contains payload data or references and external DataFile.
DataFileAttribute Represents and additional DataFile attribute.
IncludeInfo Models the ETSI element Holds info about source of data used to calculate timestamp hash.
KeyInfo Models the KeyInfo block of an XML-DSIG signature.
Notary Models an OCSP confirmation of the validity of a given signature in the given context.
Reference Represents and XML-DSIG reference block that referrs to a particular piece of signed XML data and contains it's hash code.
Signature Models an XML-DSIG/ETSI Signature.
SignatureProductionPlace Models the SignatureProductionPlace element of an XML-DSIG/ETSI Signature.
SignatureValue Models the SignatureValue element of XML-DSIG
SignedDoc Represents an instance of signed doc in DIGIDOC format.
SignedInfo Represents an XML-DSIG SignedInfo block
SignedProperties Models the SignedProperties element of an XML-DSIG/ETSI Signature.
TimestampInfo Models the ETSI timestamp element(s) Holds timestamp info and TS_RESP response.
UnsignedProperties Models the unsigned properties of a signature.
 

Exception Summary
DigiDocException JDigiDoc specific exception
